main event: A stationary white object was sighted just above the horizon in Bremerton, Washington on February 18, 1953.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a Lieutenant Commander from the 13th Naval District and a civilian observer,The object was described as large, white, and motionless,The sighting occurred at approximately 1336 hours,The exact distance of the object was not reported,The object was observed at a bearing of 270 degrees from a specific geographic coordinate.
witness description: Lieutenant Commander Garies, Staff Duty Officer, and a civilian observer, name redacted.
